title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: Let's ask an important question: can Cogitex really change the world? This is a question many of us ask ourselves when considering a new project in the world of cryptocurrencies.Cogitex represents more than just another cryptocurrency. We see our mission as creating innovative solutions in artificial intelligence and space exploration. Our goal is not just to change the rules of the game, but to open new horizons for humanity.We plan to invest in the development of AI that will become an integral part of our ecosystem. This AI will provide services behind CGTX, which will help expand the use of our cryptocurrency.In addition, we are looking higher, to the stars. Our goal is to make travel to the moon affordable and create a base for colonizing Mars. These are ambitious goals, but we believe that with your support they will become a reality.So, can Cogitex change the world? The answer to that question depends on all of us.Let's make the world a better place together!

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Let just face the fact,  which is that,  we are tired of seeing shit being put in our face being rapped as world changes,  what are changing in the world? As far as cryptocurrency is concern,  Bitcoin is the ultimate coin and all other coins are just altcoins which means alternative coins,  so why bringing up an unrealistic picture for your project for whatever reason,  calling it a possible cryptocurrency  world chang?r.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on September 17, 2023, 11:31:41 PMLet just face the fact,  which is that,  we are tired of seeing shit being put in our face being rapped as world changes,  what are changing in the world? As far as cryptocurrency is concern,  Bitcoin is the ultimate coin and all other coins are just altcoins which means alternative coins,  so why bringing up an unrealistic picture for your project for whatever reason,  calling it a possible cryptocurrency  world chang?r. I sincerely understand your point of view. At the moment, Bitcoin does have a special place in the world of cryptocurrencies and is a benchmark. However, it is important to remember that in the world of technology and financial innovation, there is always room for new ideas and projects.As for the Cogitex project, it may represent a unique contribution to the field. We see it as a step forward in the development of cryptocurrencies and blockchain. Our goal is not to claim to replace Bitcoin, but to create an innovative ecosystem that empowers cryptocurrency and blockchain.We aim to make financial technology more accessible and functional. By investing in artificial intelligence and other innovative solutions, we want to improve the user experience and offer new opportunities. Cogitex may not change the world of cryptocurrency, but it can contribute to its development and make it more diverse and efficient.

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: When looking at past experiences, i would say the chance of it being a world changer is comparable to randomly guessing the top bitcoin wallets secret key by typing random characters in a row.Making a coin is easy, making a new chain is somewhat difficult. Making a ecosystem, that actually functions and is widely accepted is almost impossible.We have seen quite a few coins with innovative new tech and some actually cool things. But it runs into the issue that almost all other products do, namely growth is really hard especially as the crypto space aint that big.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: edmundduke on September 18, 2023, 06:05:01 AMWhen looking at past experiences, i would say the chance of it being a world changer is comparable to randomly guessing the top bitcoin wallets secret key by typing random characters in a row.Making a coin is easy, making a new chain is somewhat difficult. Making a ecosystem, that actually functions and is widely accepted is almost impossible.We have seen quite a few coins with innovative new tech and some actually cool things. But it runs into the issue that almost all other products do, namely growth is really hard especially as the crypto space aint that big.Innovation always comes with challenges, and the cryptocurrency space is no exception. Growth and development may seem difficult at first, but these are the moments in history that have led to the biggest changes.Cogitex is not just another coin. It's an ambitious project that aims to create a sustainable ecosystem that will change the way we interact with financial and technology solutions. Our plans include investments in artificial intelligence and space research, which gives us a broad perspective for development.Undoubtedly, the road to success can be challenging, but it is projects like Cogitex that can be the catalysts to change the world. Let's realize these ambitions together and marvel at what we can achieve.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 18, 2023, 06:46:12 AMInnovation always comes with challenges, and the cryptocurrency space is no exception. Growth and development may seem difficult at first, but these are the moments in history that have led to the biggest changes.Cogitex is not just another coin. It's an ambitious project that aims to create a sustainable ecosystem that will change the way we interact with financial and technology solutions. Our plans include investments in artificial intelligence and space research, which gives us a broad perspective for development.Undoubtedly, the road to success can be challenging, but it is projects like Cogitex that can be the catalysts to change the world. Let's realize these ambitions together and marvel at what we can achieve.The way you respond here by publishing posts written by an AI tool clearly indicates that the developers are deprived of live communication with their desired clients. Try not to take texts from the robot. Or have you decided to change the world by making people so stupid that they will forget how to talk to each other and will always turn to bots? For me, everything related to AI is a road to nowhere.

For me, everything related to AI is a road to nowhere.It's important​ to remember that technology should complement us, not replace us, and​ I understand your concerns﻿ about the relationship between artificial intelligence and humans.​ we intend​ to invent and create artificial intelligence that will combine the efforts​ of humans and technology, making them more efficient. Our CGTX coin​ is​ a﻿ means​ to achieve this﻿ goal, not​ a﻿ means​ to reduce﻿ human connections. opportunities through Cogitex,​ we hope​ to contribute​ to​ a better and more fruitful future.​ In​ my opinion, this effectively and succinctly describes Cogitex's position and function​ in the﻿ field​ of artificial intelligence.

comments.author: danskgraes
comments.body: The idea of Cogitex making waves in AI and space exploration is fascinating. But, as they say, the proof is in the pudding. It's not just about having grand ambitions; it's about executing them effectively. Cryptocurrency markets are volatile, and AI development and space exploration are resource-intensive endeavors. So, while their mission is inspiring, it'll be interesting to see how they navigate these complex waters and turn their vision into reality.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: danskgraes on September 18, 2023, 11:27:03 AMThe idea of Cogitex making waves in AI and space exploration is fascinating. But, as they say, the proof is in the pudding. It's not just about having grand ambitions; it's about executing them effectively. Cryptocurrency markets are volatile, and AI development and space exploration are resource-intensive endeavors. So, while their mission is inspiring, it'll be interesting to see how they navigate these complex waters and turn their vision into reality.You are entirely correct when you say that achieving ambitious﻿ goals effectively​ is essential.﻿ There​ is​ no﻿ place for hollow promises​ in the﻿ realm​ of cryptocurrencies and technology. It's crucial​ to regularly﻿ offer﻿ proof​ of your actions​ in addition​ to having​ a﻿ clear understanding​ of your purpose.Cogitex completely agrees with you.​ We are﻿ aware that the bitcoin market​ is unstable and that significant financial resources are needed​ to advance artificial intelligence and﻿ space exploration.​ We commit​ to operating​ in​ an open and transparent manner.Our community will always​ be kept updated​ on our activities and all financial transactions via Twitter,﻿ along with documentation​ of transfers and outlays.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 17, 2023, 09:13:57 PMLet's ask an important question: can Cogitex really change the world? What is Cogitex? Once again we hear "hop", but where is the jump? Big words usually end up with some disaster, so before "changing the world" try to bring Cogitex closer to people, let's see something "real"(jump) before we get crazy big ideas (before we hear HOP). Good luck with your ambitious goals!

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on September 18, 2023, 02:58:41 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 17, 2023, 09:13:57 PMLet's ask an important question: can Cogitex really change the world? What is Cogitex? Once again we hear "hop", but where is the jump? Big words usually end up with some disaster, so before "changing the world" try to bring Cogitex closer to people, let's see something "real"(jump) before we get crazy big ideas (before we hear HOP). Good luck with your ambitious goals! Thank you for the wishes. We're﻿ going​ to﻿ focus​ on investing​ in the​ AI﻿ space first, and﻿ we're﻿ going​ to​ do​ it with maximum transparency​ so you can see the concrete﻿ steps﻿ we're taking. As for​ a more﻿ human approach, it's interesting​ to hear what you﻿ think​ is most important​ in this situation. What﻿ steps​ or information﻿ would you like​ to see​ to make the project seem more real and credible?

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on September 18, 2023, 09:09:51 AM~snipped~The way you sniff out these things is something I can't comprehend, frankly. I wonder if people are still going to look at the proposed project with the same eye as they did before realizing it wasn't an original attempt. It's sad how project teams like pulling the wool on others. AI contents are becoming too rampart this day to the point that we hardly know when AI posts and when humans post too. People easily relapse to getting AI content instead of wracking their brains to prepare something genuine.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: You are talking about AI and Mars? I have seen many projects that have raised a lot of funds, and none of them has set such a big goal. It seems like all these things require a significant amount of funding. Do you have your own reserve fund, as you mentioned making travel to the moon affordable? From what I know, it's not that easy it requires substantial funding for all of these endeavors. So, I would say your goal is quite ambitious, and implementing it on the ground is going to be very challenging.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: gurunanakji777 on September 25, 2023, 11:55:06 AMYou are talking about AI and Mars? I have seen many projects that have raised a lot of funds, and none of them has set such a big goal. It seems like all these things require a significant amount of funding. Do you have your own reserve fund, as you mentioned making travel to the moon affordable? From what I know, it's not that easy it requires substantial funding for all of these endeavors. So, I would say your goal is quite ambitious, and implementing it on the ground is going to be very challenging.I agree, it won't be an easy task. I haven't seen many projects that set similar challenges, but I don't doubt that there are some.Yes, traveling to the moon will require a lot of funding, but we will move towards the goal gradually. Before that, we will develop the sphere of AI. And we will notify about all actions on Twitter and Telegram
